name: Keep Da Flo
description:
Following the Ludum Dare 46 theme - Keep it alive, our “Keep Da Flo” will keep the player engaged using a whiteboard marker (mouse as a controller) to draw platforms while you use a spacebar to jump, and WASD to control the player. How far will you go? Share your score with your friends! Post your highest score here in the COMMENT. You got the right to brag!

Initially this was developed as a two player game, however for those who enjoy challenges, you can play it by yourself. It’s kind of like learning to pat your head while rubbing your belly!!

This game is created by @ertopena and @joowonsome.
